name: smart-life-manager
description: A comprehensive life management application built with React, Node.js, and modern web technologies

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.format: npm run format:client && npm run format:server
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd client && npm audit && cd ../server && npm audit
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:client: cd client && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json build
scripts.clean:server: cd server && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm run clean

author: Smart Life Manager Team
